trans:
So, certainly you took that phone charger ğŸ”Œ and used it to hit me right in the face. Afterwards, I kept my words and bent you over on the bed and spanked you with my hands âœ‹.
Then you began to spit in my face and told me that you would call the police to say that I raped you. That was terrible.
Several weeks ago, I lost my job; as a result, I fill out job applications daily. I am a hardworking person and I love workingğŸ‘. If I am accused of such a horrible thing, I might never have a good job in the future.
I am putting much effort into becoming a good man to you, my dear. I constantly try my best to look after you and treat your friends and family with politeness and respect.
